nodes.title: about me
nodes.info: Hi all! Currently a penultimate year student at the National University of Singapore (NUS), pursuing a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, I'm an aspiring full-stack software engineer. Since the beginning of my time in NUS, I have developed a keen interest in software engineering and data development. More often than not, technology's ability to greatly improve people's standard of living has left me in awe. Its unexplored potentials excite me to continue discovering new technology, helping people in any way possible. I'm a highly motivated and driven individual, that regards heavily on failures as important learning opportunities to better myself constantly. As a practical learner, I'm always looking out for opportunities to offer my experience in insightful projects, no matter how small or big. Outside of school, I'm a caring friend that strives to be a pillar of support to those who matter to me most. Being family orientated, I would always make a habit to spend quality time with them, no matter how busy. I also enjoy keeping myself fit through sports that I love, such as basketball and table-tennis.
